it.unimib.disco.essere.core

Class InputParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unimib.disco.essere.core.InputParser

  • public class InputParser
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that receive the input as flag, extract the values of each one of those and call Handler's method that will contain all the steps for perform the request
